ai-pp2.4:1.1_0: And what person is a person?
ai-pp2.4:1.2_0: It’s when a person kills living creatures, steals, commits sexual misconduct, lies, and uses alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
ai-pp2.4:1.3_0: This is called a person who has specific knowledge.
ai-pp2.4:2.1_0: And what person is a worse person?
ai-pp2.4:2.2_0: It’s someone who kills living creatures, steals, commits sexual misconduct, lies, and uses alcoholic drinks that cause negligence. They encourage others to do the same. And they encourage others to do these things.
ai-pp2.4:2.3_0: This is called a person who has better than a better person.
ai-pp2.4:3.1_0: And what person is a good person?
ai-pp2.4:3.2_0: It’s when someone doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
ai-pp2.4:3.3_0: This is called a person who is a consummate.
ai-pp2.4:4.1_0: And what person is a better person?
ai-pp2.4:4.2_0: It’s when a person doesn’t kill, etc. ... and encourages others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:4.3_0: This is called a person who is better.
ai-pp2.4:5.2_0: It’s when a person kills living creatures, steals, and commits sexual misconduct. They use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re covetous, malicious, with wrong view.
ai-pp2.4:5.3_0: This is called a person with bad results.
ai-pp2.4:6.2_0: It’s when a person kills living creatures, steals, commits sexual misconduct, lies, and uses alcoholic drinks that cause negligence. They’re covetous, malicious, with wrong view. And they encourage others to do these things.
ai-pp2.4:6.3_0: This is called a worse person.
ai-pp2.4:7.2_0: It’s when someone doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re contented, kind-hearted, and have right view.
ai-pp2.4:7.3_0: This is called a person good practice.
ai-pp2.4:8.2_0: It’s when a person doesn’t kill, etc. ... and encourages others to not kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. They’re contented, kind-hearted, with right view. And they encourage others to do these things.
ai-pp2.4:8.3_0: This is called a person who has good practice.
ai-pp2.4:9.2_0: It’s someone who kills living creatures, steals, commits sexual misconduct, and uses alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
ai-pp2.4:9.4_0: This is called a personal liable to fall.
ai-pp2.4:10.2_0: It’s someone who kills living creatures, steals, commits sexual misconduct, lies, and uses alcoholic drinks that cause negligence. They encourage others to do the same. And they encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:10.3_0: They themselves have wrong view. They encourage others to have wrong view. And they approve of wrong view.
ai-pp2.4:10.4_0: This is called a person who has worse character.
ai-pp2.4:11.2_0: It’s when a person doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct.
ai-pp2.4:11.4_0: This is called a person good principle.
ai-pp2.4:12.2_0: It’s someone who doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence. And they encourage others to avoid these things.
ai-pp2.4:12.3_0: They themselves have right view. They encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:12.4_0: This is called a person good character.
ai-pp2.4:13.1_0: And what person is the blameworthy?
ai-pp2.4:13.2_0: It’s when a person does things by way of body, speech, and mind that are blameworthy.
ai-pp2.4:13.3_0: This is called a person who is blameworthy.
ai-pp2.4:14.1_0: And what person is mostly blameworthy?
ai-pp2.4:14.2_0: It’s when a person does things by way of body, speech, and mind that are mostly blameworthy, but occasionally blameless.
ai-pp2.4:14.3_0: This is called a person who has much food.
ai-pp2.4:15.2_0: It’s when a person does things by way of body, speech, and mind that are mostly blameworthy, but occasionally blameless.
ai-pp2.4:15.3_0: This is called a lamp of cloth.
ai-pp2.4:16.2_0: It’s when a person does things by way of body, speech, and mind that are blameless.
ai-pp2.4:16.3_0: This is called a person who is blameworthy.
ai-pp2.4:17.1_0: And who is the person who knows the meaning?
ai-pp2.4:17.2_0: but an individual who has a foundation of immersion in connection with the teaching:
ai-pp2.4:17.3_0: This is called a person who knows “one who knows moderation.”
ai-pp2.4:18.1_0: And what person is the one who understands?
ai-pp2.4:18.2_0: Whoever has spoken in detail the meaning of this brief statement:
ai-pp2.4:18.3_0: This is called a person who knows the right way.
ai-pp2.4:19.1_0: And who is the person hard to measure?
ai-pp2.4:19.2_0: Whoever attends on such a person with good friends, companions, and associates, and associates with good friends,
ai-pp2.4:19.3_0: This is called a person better.
ai-pp2.4:20.1_0: And who is the personal worst encounter
ai-pp2.4:20.2_0: But when they hear a person with a lot, even when they’re drunk, because of their speech and behaves and lots of them,
ai-pp2.4:20.3_0: This is called a personal worst (of the same).
ai-pp2.4:21.1_0: And what person speaks on topic, but not fluently?
ai-pp2.4:21.2_0: It may be that someone who, when asked a question, speaks without response, says,
ai-pp2.4:21.3_0: This is called a person who does not feel inspired to speak.
ai-pp2.4:22.1_0: And what person speaks on topic, not fluently?
ai-pp2.4:22.2_0: It may happen that a person who is asked a question, but not a fact that.
ai-pp2.4:22.3_0: This is called a person who doesn’t feel inspired to speak, and eloquently.
ai-pp2.4:23.1_0: And what person speaks on topic and fluently?
ai-pp2.4:23.2_0: It may happen that someone who is asked a question, and he responsible when asked a question.
ai-pp2.4:23.3_0: This is called a person who speaks on topic and fluently.
ai-pp2.4:24.1_0: And who is a person who neither on topic nor fluently?
ai-pp2.4:24.2_0: It may be that someone who is asked a question, but not quickly answers when asked.
ai-pp2.4:24.3_0: This is called a person who does not feel inspired to speak, nor fluently.
ai-pp2.4:25.1_0: Herein, what are the four people who speak in accordance with the Teaching?
ai-pp2.4:25.2_0: It may be that someone who speaks on the teaching, and an assembly can’t tell what’s on topic and what’s off topic.
ai-pp2.4:25.3_0: Such an assembly regards such a Dhamma speaker simply as a Dhamma speaker.
ai-pp2.4:26.1_0: Take a Dhamma speaker who recites the teaching, and an assembly with few people.
ai-pp2.4:26.2_0: Such an assembly regards such a Dhamma speaker simply as a Dhamma speaker.
ai-pp2.4:27.1_0: Take a Dhamma speaker who speaks much, and isn’t skilled in the assembly. And they’re not skilled in the assembly.
ai-pp2.4:27.2_0: Such an assembly regards such a Dhamma speaker simply as a Dhamma speaker.
ai-pp2.4:28.1_0: Take a Dhamma speaker who speaks much and stays on topic. They’re skilled in a assembly.
ai-pp2.4:28.2_0: Such an assembly regards such a Dhamma speaker simply as a Dhamma speaker.
ai-pp2.4:29.1_0: These are the four kinds of people.
ai-pp2.4:30.1_0: Herein, where are the four people like a clouds?
ai-pp2.4:30.3_0: one rains but doesn’t thunder, nor rain, and the rainy season.
ai-pp2.4:30.4_0: In the same way, these four people similar to clouds are found in the world.
ai-pp2.4:30.6_0: one rains but doesn’t thunder, nor rain, and the rainy season.
ai-pp2.4:31.1_0: And how does a person thunder but not rain?
ai-pp2.4:31.2_0: It may be that someone is a doer, not a talker.
ai-pp2.4:31.3_0: That’s how a person thunders but doesn’t rain.
ai-pp2.4:31.4_0: That person is like a cloud that thunders but doesn’t continue.
ai-pp2.4:32.1_0: And how does a person rain but not thunder?
ai-pp2.4:32.2_0: It’s when someone is a doer, not a talker.
ai-pp2.4:32.3_0: That’s how a person rains but doesn’t thunder.
ai-pp2.4:32.4_0: That person is like a cloud that rains heavily, but doesn’t mortify.
ai-pp2.4:33.1_0: And how does a person both thunder and rain?
ai-pp2.4:33.2_0: It may be that someone is a doer, and a servant.
ai-pp2.4:33.3_0: That’s how a person both thunder and rain.
ai-pp2.4:33.4_0: That person is like a cloud that rains heavily.
ai-pp2.4:34.1_0: And how does a person neither thunder nor rain?
ai-pp2.4:34.2_0: It may happen that someone is neither a talker nor a doer.
ai-pp2.4:34.3_0: That’s how a person neither thunder nor rains.
ai-pp2.4:34.4_0: I say that person is like a cloud that neither thunders nor rains, like a person going to the rainy season.
ai-pp2.4:35.1_0: These four people similar to clouds are found in the world.
ai-pp2.4:36.1_0: Herein, what are the four people like a mix-sphere?
ai-pp2.4:36.2_0: there are four kinds of mice:
ai-pp2.4:36.3_0: one makes a hole but doesn’t live in it, and doesn’t live in it.
ai-pp2.4:36.4_0: In the same way, these four people similar to mice are found in the world.
ai-pp2.4:36.6_0: one makes a hole but doesn’t live in it, and doesn’t live in it.
ai-pp2.4:37.1_0: And how does a person make a hole but not live in it?
ai-pp2.4:37.2_0: It’s when a person memorizes the teaching ...
ai-pp2.4:37.3_0: statements, songs, discussions, verses, inspired exclamations, legends, stories of past lives, amazing stories, and classifications.
ai-pp2.4:37.4_0: But they don’t truly understand about suffering, its origin, its cessation, and the path.
ai-pp2.4:37.5_0: That’s how a person makes a hole but doesn’t live in it.
ai-pp2.4:37.6_0: That person is like a mouse that makes a hole but doesn’t live in it, I say.
ai-pp2.4:38.1_0: And how does a person make a hole but not live in it?
ai-pp2.4:38.2_0: It’s when a person doesn’t memorize the teaching ...
ai-pp2.4:38.3_0: statements, songs, discussions, verses, inspired exclamations, legends, stories of past lives, amazing stories, and classifications.
ai-pp2.4:38.4_0: They truly understand: “This is suffering” ... “This is the origin of suffering” ... “This is the cessation of suffering” ... “This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering”.
ai-pp2.4:38.5_0: That’s how a person makes a hole but doesn’t live in it.
ai-pp2.4:38.6_0: That person is like a mouse that makes a hole but doesn’t live in it, I say.
ai-pp2.4:39.1_0: And how does a person both make a hole and live in it?
ai-pp2.4:39.2_0: It’s when a person memorizes the teaching ...
ai-pp2.4:39.3_0: statements, songs, discussions, verses, inspired exclamations, legends, stories of past lives, amazing stories, and classifications.
ai-pp2.4:39.4_0: They truly understand: “This is suffering” ... “This is the origin of suffering” ... “This is the cessation of suffering” ... “This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering”.
ai-pp2.4:39.5_0: That’s how a person both makes a hole and lives in it.
ai-pp2.4:39.6_0: That person is like a mouse that makes a hole but doesn’t live in it, I say.
ai-pp2.4:40.1_0: And how does a person neither make a hole nor live in it?
ai-pp2.4:40.2_0: It’s when a person doesn’t memorize the teaching ...
ai-pp2.4:40.3_0: statements, songs, discussions, verses, inspired exclamations, legends, stories of past lives, amazing stories, and classifications.
ai-pp2.4:40.4_0: But they don’t truly understand about suffering, its origin, its cessation, and the path.
ai-pp2.4:40.5_0: That’s how a person neither makes a hole nor live in it.
ai-pp2.4:40.6_0: That person is like a mouse that neither makes a hole nor live in it, I say.
ai-pp2.4:41.1_0: These four people similar to mice are found in the world.
ai-pp2.4:42.1_0: Herein, what four persons are like a mango?
ai-pp2.4:42.3_0: one is ripe and seems unripe, and seems unripe, and seems unripe and seems ripe,
ai-pp2.4:42.4_0: In the same way, these four people similar to mangoes are found in the world.
ai-pp2.4:42.6_0: One is unripe but seems ripe, and seems unripe,
ai-pp2.4:43.1_0: And how is a person unripe but seems ripe?
ai-pp2.4:43.2_0: Take a certain person who is impressive ...
ai-pp2.4:43.3_0: But they don’t truly understand about suffering, its origin, its cessation, and the path.
ai-pp2.4:43.4_0: That’s how a person is unripe but seems ripe.
ai-pp2.4:43.5_0: That person is like a man with ripe but seems ripe to shine.
ai-pp2.4:44.1_0: And how is a person ripe but seems unripe?
ai-pp2.4:44.2_0: Take a certain person who is not impressive ...
ai-pp2.4:44.3_0: They truly understand: “This is suffering” ... “This is the origin of suffering” ... “This is the cessation of suffering” ... “This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering”.
ai-pp2.4:44.4_0: That’s how a person is ripe but seems unripe.
ai-pp2.4:44.5_0: That person is like a mango that’s unripe but seems ripe, I say.
ai-pp2.4:45.1_0: And how is a person unripe and seems unripe?
ai-pp2.4:45.2_0: Take a certain person who is not impressive ...
ai-pp2.4:45.3_0: But they don’t truly understand about suffering ...
ai-pp2.4:45.4_0: “This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering”.
ai-pp2.4:45.5_0: That’s how a person is unripe and seems unripe,
ai-pp2.4:45.6_0: That person is like a golden statue of rose-apple tree.
ai-pp2.4:46.1_0: And how is a person ripe but seems ripe?
ai-pp2.4:46.2_0: Take a certain person who is impressive ...
ai-pp2.4:46.4_0: he knows as it really is “this is the Practice Leading to the Cessation of Suffering”.
ai-pp2.4:46.5_0: That’s how a person is ripe but seems ripe.
ai-pp2.4:46.6_0: That person is like a mango that was ripe but seems ripe, I say.
ai-pp2.4:47.1_0: These four people similar to mangoes are found in the world.
ai-pp2.4:48.1_0: Herein, what four persons are like jars?
ai-pp2.4:48.4_0: In the same way, these four people similar to pots are found in the world.
ai-pp2.4:49.1_0: And how is a person covered but hollow?
ai-pp2.4:49.2_0: Take a certain person who is impressive ...
ai-pp2.4:49.3_0: But they don’t truly understand about suffering ...
ai-pp2.4:49.4_0: “This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering”.
ai-pp2.4:49.5_0: That’s how a person is covered but hollow.
ai-pp2.4:49.6_0: That person is like a pot that’s covered but hollow.
ai-pp2.4:50.1_0: And how is a person uncovered but full?
ai-pp2.4:50.2_0: Take a certain person who is not impressive ...
ai-pp2.4:50.4_0: he knows as it really is “this is the Practice Leading to the Cessation of Suffering”.
ai-pp2.4:50.5_0: That’s how a person is uncovered but full.
ai-pp2.4:50.6_0: That person is like a pot full of water.
ai-pp2.4:51.1_0: And how is a person uncovered and hollow?
ai-pp2.4:51.2_0: Take a certain person who is not impressive ...
ai-pp2.4:51.3_0: But they don’t truly understand about suffering ...
ai-pp2.4:51.4_0: “This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering”.
ai-pp2.4:51.5_0: That’s how a person is uncovered but hollow,
ai-pp2.4:51.6_0: That person is like a pot that’s covered with hollows.
ai-pp2.4:52.1_0: And how is a person covered and full?
ai-pp2.4:52.2_0: Take a certain person who is impressive ...
ai-pp2.4:52.4_0: he knows as it really is “this is the Practice Leading to the Cessation of Suffering”.
ai-pp2.4:52.5_0: That’s how a person is covered and full.
ai-pp2.4:52.6_0: That person is like a pot full of water.
ai-pp2.4:53.1_0: These four people similar to pots are found in the world.
ai-pp2.4:54.1_0: Herein, where are the four people like an individual?
ai-pp2.4:54.3_0: One is shallow but appears deep, shallow, shallow, deep, and appears deep.
ai-pp2.4:54.4_0: In the same way, these four people similar to lakes are found in the world.
ai-pp2.4:54.6_0: One is shallow but appears deep, shallow, shallow, deep, and appears deep.
ai-pp2.4:55.1_0: And how is a person shallow but appears deep?
ai-pp2.4:55.2_0: Take a certain person who is impressive ...
ai-pp2.4:55.3_0: But they don’t truly understand about suffering ...
ai-pp2.4:55.4_0: “This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering”.
ai-pp2.4:55.5_0: That’s how a person is shallow but appears deep.
ai-pp2.4:55.6_0: That person is like a deep lake like a deep lake.
ai-pp2.4:56.1_0: And how is a person deep but appears shallow?
ai-pp2.4:56.2_0: Take a certain person who is not impressive ...
ai-pp2.4:56.4_0: he knows as it really is “this is the Practice Leading to the Cessation of Suffering”.
ai-pp2.4:56.5_0: That’s how a person is deep but appears shallow.
ai-pp2.4:56.6_0: That person is like a deep lake like a deep lake.
ai-pp2.4:57.1_0: And how is a person shallow and appears shallow?
ai-pp2.4:57.2_0: Take a certain person who is not impressive ...
ai-pp2.4:57.3_0: But they don’t truly understand about suffering ...
ai-pp2.4:57.4_0: “This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering”.
ai-pp2.4:57.5_0: That’s how a person is shallow but appears shallow.
ai-pp2.4:57.6_0: That person is like a lake like a lake.
ai-pp2.4:58.1_0: And how is a person deep but appears deep?
ai-pp2.4:58.2_0: Take a certain person who is impressive ...
ai-pp2.4:58.4_0: he knows as it really is “this is the Practice Leading to the Cessation of Suffering”.
ai-pp2.4:58.5_0: That’s how a person is deep but appears deep.
ai-pp2.4:58.6_0: That person is like a deep lake fed by springs.
ai-pp2.4:59.1_0: These four people similar to lakes are found in the world.
ai-pp2.4:60.1_0: Herein, what are the four oxen oxen?
ai-pp2.4:60.3_0: One hostile to their own herd, not others; and one’s own her own herd, not others; one who hostile to the other, not others; and one who is hostile to both their own herd.
ai-pp2.4:60.4_0: In the same way, these four people similar to oxen are found in the world.
ai-pp2.4:60.6_0: One hostile to their own herd, not others; and one’s own her own herd, not others; one who hostile to the other, not others; and one who is hostile to both their own herd.
ai-pp2.4:61.1_0: And how is a person hostile to their own herd, not others?
ai-pp2.4:61.2_0: It’s when someone intimidates their own followers, not others.
ai-pp2.4:61.3_0: That’s how a person is hostile to their own herd, not others.
ai-pp2.4:61.4_0: That person is like an ox that’s hostile to its own herd, not others.
ai-pp2.4:62.1_0: And how is a person hostile to other herds, not others?
ai-pp2.4:62.2_0: It may happen that a person intimidates the followers of others, not their own.
ai-pp2.4:62.3_0: That’s how a person is hostile to others, not their own.
ai-pp2.4:62.4_0: That person is like an ox that’s hostile to its own herd, not others.
ai-pp2.4:63.1_0: And how is a person hostile to both their own herd and others?
ai-pp2.4:63.2_0: It may happen that a person intimidates the followers of others,
ai-pp2.4:63.3_0: That’s how a person is hostile to both their own herd and others.
ai-pp2.4:63.4_0: That person is like an ox that’s hostile to both their own herd and others.
ai-pp2.4:64.1_0: And how is a person hostile to neither their own herd nor others?
ai-pp2.4:64.2_0: It’s when someone doesn’t intimidate their own followers or the followers of others.
ai-pp2.4:64.3_0: That’s how a person is hostile to neither their own herd nor others.
ai-pp2.4:64.4_0: That person is like an ox that’s hostile to its own herd, not others.
ai-pp2.4:65.1_0: These four people similar to oxen are found in the world.
ai-pp2.4:66.1_0: Herein, what are the four people like a viper?
ai-pp2.4:66.3_0: one whose venom is both fast-acting and lethal, but not lethal.
ai-pp2.4:66.4_0: In the same way, these four people similar to vipers are found in the world.
ai-pp2.4:66.6_0: one whose venom is both fast-acting and lethal, but not lethal.
ai-pp2.4:67.1_0: And how is a person’s venom fast-acting but not lethal?
ai-pp2.4:67.2_0: It’s when a person is often angry,
ai-pp2.4:67.3_0: and their anger doesn’t linger long.
ai-pp2.4:67.4_0: This is how a person’s venomous but not lethal.
ai-pp2.4:67.5_0: That person is like the lethal poisonous viper but not the taste.
ai-pp2.4:68.1_0: And how is a person’s venom fast-acting but not lethal?
ai-pp2.4:68.2_0: It’s someone who is often angry,
ai-pp2.4:68.3_0: and their anger lingers for a long time.
ai-pp2.4:68.4_0: That’s how a person is venomous, not fast-acting.
ai-pp2.4:68.5_0: This person is like the lethal poisonous viper, not the one whose venomous in the open.
ai-pp2.4:69.1_0: And how is a person’s venom both fast-acting and lethal?
ai-pp2.4:69.2_0: It’s when a person is often angry,
ai-pp2.4:69.3_0: and their anger lingers for a long time.
ai-pp2.4:69.4_0: That’s how a person is’s venom both fast-acting and lethal.
ai-pp2.4:69.5_0: That person is like the lethal poisonous viper and the one whose venom is fast-acting but let go of this person.
ai-pp2.4:70.1_0: And how is a person’s venom neither fast-acting nor lethal?
ai-pp2.4:70.2_0: It’s someone who is often angry,
ai-pp2.4:70.3_0: and their anger doesn’t linger long.
ai-pp2.4:70.4_0: That’s how a person is neither fast-acting nor lethal.
ai-pp2.4:70.5_0: That person is like a viper who neither fast-acting nor lethal.
ai-pp2.4:71.1_0: These four people similar to vipers are found in the world.
ai-pp2.4:72.1_0: And how does a person criticize those deserving of praise?
ai-pp2.4:72.2_0: It’s when someone practicing wrongly, praises the ascetics of other religions; and
ai-pp2.4:72.4_0: That’s how a person criticizes those deserving of praise.
ai-pp2.4:73.1_0: And how does a person criticize those deserving of praise?
ai-pp2.4:73.2_0: It’s when someone practices to practice the way of practice properly:
ai-pp2.4:73.4_0: That’s how a person criticizes those deserving of praise.
ai-pp2.4:74.1_0: And how does a person arouse faith in things that are dubious,
ai-pp2.4:74.2_0: It’s when a person practices poorly.
ai-pp2.4:74.3_0: “They domain,” he said, “There is no need to bearer of rapture,”
ai-pp2.4:74.4_0: That’s how a person doesn’t arouse faith in things that are dubious,
ai-pp2.4:75.1_0: And how is a person without examining or scrutinizing?
ai-pp2.4:75.2_0: It’s when a person practices rightly inspires confidence in those without it.
ai-pp2.4:75.3_0: “On the prohibition against it” is said, “ thus it is “with happiness” .
ai-pp2.4:75.4_0: That’s how a person doesn’t arouse faith in things that are dubious,
ai-pp2.4:76.1_0: And how does a person criticize those deserving of criticism?
ai-pp2.4:76.2_0: It’s when someone practices inappropriately, but here they disparage the ascetics of other religions:
ai-pp2.4:76.4_0: That’s how a person is criticizeed and criticizes those deserving of criticism.
ai-pp2.4:77.1_0: And how does a person praise those deserving of praise?
ai-pp2.4:77.2_0: It’s when someone practices to practice the way of practice accordingly,
ai-pp2.4:77.4_0: That’s how a person praises those deserving of praise.
ai-pp2.4:78.1_0: And how does a person do arouse faith in things that are dubious,
ai-pp2.4:78.2_0: It’s when a person practices improperly.
ai-pp2.4:78.3_0: “On the prohibition against it” is said, “ thus it is “with happiness” .
ai-pp2.4:78.4_0: That’s how a person doesn’t arouse faith in things that are dubious,
ai-pp2.4:79.1_0: And how does a person arouse faith in things that are inspiring?
ai-pp2.4:79.2_0: It’s when a person practices rightly in conformity with good will.
ai-pp2.4:79.3_0: “They domain,” he said, “There is no need to bearer of rapture,”
ai-pp2.4:79.4_0: That’s how a person doesn’t arouse faith in things that are inspiring.
ai-pp2.4:80.1_0: And how does a person criticize those deserving of praise ...
ai-pp2.4:80.2_0: It’s when someone is praised by shame, and he is mostly blameworthy.
ai-pp2.4:80.3_0: When you praise what is untrue, false, and pointless, then you don’t praise at the right time, truthfully and substantively.
ai-pp2.4:80.4_0: This is how you praise those deserving of praise ...
ai-pp2.4:81.1_0: And how does a person praise those deserving of praise ... Nor do they criticize those deserving of criticism ...
ai-pp2.4:81.2_0: It’s when someone is praised by shame, and he is mostly blameworthy.
ai-pp2.4:81.3_0: When you praise that what is true, real, and unreal, not beneficial;
ai-pp2.4:81.4_0: That’s how a person praises those deserving of praise ... Nor do they criticize those deserving of criticism ...
ai-pp2.4:82.1_0: And how does a person criticize those deserving of criticism at the right time, truthfully and substantively?
ai-pp2.4:82.2_0: It’s when someone is praised by shame, and he is mostly blameworthy.
ai-pp2.4:82.3_0: When you praise what is untrue, false, and pointless, then you praise at the right time, truthfully and substantively.
ai-pp2.4:82.4_0: There it is the right time to answer.
ai-pp2.4:82.5_0: This is how you praise those deserving of praise ...
ai-pp2.4:83.1_0: And how does a person neither praise those deserving of praise at the right time, truthfully and substantively?
ai-pp2.4:83.2_0: It’s when someone is praised by shame, and he is mostly blameworthy.
ai-pp2.4:83.3_0: When you praise what is untrue, false, and pointless, then you don’t praise at the right time, truthfully and substantively.
ai-pp2.4:83.4_0: he dwells equanimous, mindful and aware.
ai-pp2.4:83.5_0: This person doesn’t praise those deserving of praise ... Nor do they criticize those deserving of criticism ...
ai-pp2.4:84.1_0: And what person lives off the fruit of good and bad deeds, but not solitude?
ai-pp2.4:84.2_0: Whoever finds an individual’s initiative, with their lifespan, not merit.
ai-pp2.4:84.3_0: This is called a person who lives off the fruit of good and bad deeds, but not soul.
ai-pp2.4:85.1_0: And what person lives off the fruit of good and bad deeds, but not initiative?
ai-pp2.4:85.2_0: the Gods Who Control the Creations of Others, or the Gods Who Control the Creations of Others.
ai-pp2.4:86.1_0: And who is the person who lives in the fruit of good and bad deeds?
ai-pp2.4:86.2_0: Whoever, trives away from a person, whether in a person who lives or in a solitary merit is reborn and is reborn.
ai-pp2.4:86.3_0: This is called a person who lives in the fruit of good and bad deeds.
ai-pp2.4:87.1_0: And what person is the fruit of neither initiative nor deeds?
ai-pp2.4:87.2_0: one who lives off the fruit of neither initiative nor deeds, but not in the fruit of good deeds.
ai-pp2.4:88.1_0: And how is a person dark and bound for darkness?
ai-pp2.4:88.2_0: It may happen that someone is reborn in a low family.
ai-pp2.4:88.3_0: They’d be reborn in a low class family—a family of outcastes, bamboo-workers, hunters, chariot-makers, or waste-collectors—poor, with little to eat or drink, where life is tough, and food and shelter are hard to find.
ai-pp2.4:88.4_0: And they’re ugly, unsightly, deformed, chronically ill—one-eyed, crippled, lame, or half-paralyzed. They don’t get to have food, drink, clothes, and vehicles; garlands, perfumes, and makeup; or bed, house, and lighting.
ai-pp2.4:88.5_0: But they do bad things by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-pp2.4:88.6_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-pp2.4:88.7_0: That’s how a person is dark and bound for darkness.
ai-pp2.4:89.1_0: And how is a person dark and bound for light?
ai-pp2.4:89.2_0: It may happen that someone is reborn in a low family.
ai-pp2.4:89.3_0: They’d be reborn in a low class family—a family of outcastes, bamboo-workers, hunters, chariot-makers, or waste-collectors—poor, with little to eat or drink, where life is tough, and food and shelter are hard to find.
ai-pp2.4:89.4_0: And they’re ugly, unsightly, deformed, chronically ill—one-eyed, crippled, lame, or half-paralyzed. They don’t get to have food, drink, clothes, and vehicles; garlands, perfumes, and makeup; or bed, house, and lighting.
ai-pp2.4:89.5_0: And they do good things by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-pp2.4:89.6_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-pp2.4:89.7_0: That’s how a person is dark and bound for light.
ai-pp2.4:90.1_0: And how is a person light and bound for darkness?
ai-pp2.4:90.2_0: It may happen that someone is reborn in an eminent family.
ai-pp2.4:90.3_0: They’d be reborn in a well-to-do family of aristocrats, brahmins, or householders—rich, affluent, and wealthy, with lots of gold and silver, lots of property and assets, and lots of money and grain.
ai-pp2.4:90.4_0: And they’re attractive, good-looking, lovely, of surpassing beauty. They get to have food, drink, clothes, and vehicles; garlands, perfumes, and makeup; and bed, house, and lighting.
ai-pp2.4:90.5_0: But they do bad things by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-pp2.4:90.6_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-pp2.4:90.7_0: That’s how a person is light and bound for darkness.
ai-pp2.4:91.1_0: And how is a person light and bound for light?
ai-pp2.4:91.2_0: It may happen that someone is reborn in an eminent family.
ai-pp2.4:91.3_0: They’d be reborn in a well-to-do family of aristocrats, brahmins, or householders—rich, affluent, and wealthy, with lots of gold and silver, lots of property and assets, and lots of money and grain.
ai-pp2.4:91.4_0: And they’re attractive, good-looking, lovely, of surpassing beauty. They get to have food, drink, clothes, and vehicles; garlands, perfumes, and makeup; and bed, house, and lighting.
ai-pp2.4:91.5_0: And they do good things by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-pp2.4:91.6_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-pp2.4:91.7_0: That’s how a person is light and bound for light.
ai-pp2.4:92.1_0: And how is a person stinking? ...
ai-pp2.4:92.2_0: That’s how a person is undisturbed.
ai-pp2.4:93.1_0: And how is a person early overcome by ears? ...
ai-pp2.4:93.2_0: That’s how a person is fastened in sunn hemp.
ai-pp2.4:94.1_0: And how is a person risen early? ...
ai-pp2.4:94.2_0: That’s how a person is drawn out from the ear.
ai-pp2.4:95.1_0: And how is a person early overcome by ear? ...
ai-pp2.4:95.2_0: That’s how a person is filled in the ear.
ai-pp2.4:96.1_0: Herein, what are the four people like a person?
ai-pp2.4:96.3_0: One is a softwood surrounded by softwoods, surrounded by softwoods, and softwoods,
ai-pp2.4:96.4_0: In the same way, these four people similar to trees are found in the world.
ai-pp2.4:96.6_0: One is a softwood surrounded by softwoods, surrounded by softwoods, and softwoods,
ai-pp2.4:97.1_0: And how is a person a softwood surrounded by hardwoods?
ai-pp2.4:97.2_0: It’s when a person is unethical, of bad character, but their followers are ethical, of good character.
ai-pp2.4:97.3_0: That’s how a person is a softwood surrounded by hardwoods.
ai-pp2.4:97.4_0: That person is like a softwood tree that’s surrounded by softwoods.
ai-pp2.4:98.1_0: And how is a person a hardwood surrounded by softwoods?
ai-pp2.4:98.2_0: It’s when a person is ethical, of good character, but their followers are unethical, of bad character.
ai-pp2.4:98.3_0: That’s how a person is a hardwood surrounded by softwoods.
ai-pp2.4:98.4_0: That person is like a softwood tree that’s surrounded by softwoods, I say.
ai-pp2.4:99.1_0: And how is a person a softwood surrounded by softwoods?
ai-pp2.4:99.2_0: It’s when a person is unethical, of bad character, and their followers are the same.
ai-pp2.4:99.3_0: That’s how a person is a softwood surrounded by softwoods.
ai-pp2.4:99.4_0: That person is like a softwood tree that’s surrounded by softwoods, I say.
ai-pp2.4:100.1_0: And how is a person a hardwood surrounded by hardwoods?
ai-pp2.4:100.2_0: It’s when someone is ethical, of good character, and their followers are the same.
ai-pp2.4:100.3_0: That’s how a person is a hardwood surrounded by heart.
ai-pp2.4:100.4_0: That person is like a chariot surrounded by the branch.
ai-pp2.4:101.1_0: These four people similar to trees are found in the world.
ai-pp2.4:102.1_0: And what person has the formless realm?
ai-pp2.4:102.2_0: It may be that someone sees a certain person, or they seem to be squeezing, but they lie down on it.
ai-pp2.4:102.3_0: This is called a person who has measureless forms.
ai-pp2.4:103.1_0: And who is the person with keen heartwood?
ai-pp2.4:103.2_0: It’s when someone praises the colour of another, the other person, and grabbing the successes of others and praises of others.
ai-pp2.4:103.3_0: This is called a person with hollows in the neck.
ai-pp2.4:104.1_0: And who is the person with coarse mortification and shabby.
ai-pp2.4:104.2_0: It’s when someone sees a new robe, sees a knife, having seen that it doesn’t even see anyone or hear it, or who sees it or hears about it.
ai-pp2.4:104.3_0: This is called a person with rough mortification for self.
ai-pp2.4:105.1_0: And who is the person with gift of the teaching?
ai-pp2.4:105.2_0: It’s when a person sees a ethics or immersion, but sees them wherever they lay down, and lay down on their confidence.
ai-pp2.4:105.3_0: This is called a person with gift of the teaching.
ai-pp2.4:106.1_0: And how does a person practice to benefit themselves, but not others?
ai-pp2.4:106.2_0: It’s when a person is accomplished in ethics, but doesn’t encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:106.3_0: They’re accomplished in immersion, but don’t encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:106.4_0: They’re accomplished in wisdom, but don’t encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:106.5_0: They’re accomplished in freedom, but don’t encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:106.6_0: They’re accomplished in the knowledge and vision of freedom, but don’t encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:106.7_0: That’s how a person practices to benefit themselves, but not others.
ai-pp2.4:107.1_0: And how does a person practice to benefit others, but not themselves?
ai-pp2.4:107.2_0: It’s someone who is not personally accomplished in ethics, immersion, wisdom, freedom, or the knowledge and vision of freedom. But they encourage others in these qualities.
ai-pp2.4:107.3_0: They’re not accomplished in immersion, but encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:107.4_0: They’re not accomplished in wisdom. They encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:107.5_0: They’re not accomplished in freedom, they encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:107.6_0: They’re not accomplished in the knowledge and vision of freedom, nor do they encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:107.7_0: That’s how a person practices to benefit others, but not themselves.
ai-pp2.4:108.1_0: And how does a person practice to benefit both themselves and others?
ai-pp2.4:108.2_0: It’s someone who is accomplished in ethics, immersion, and wisdom. They encourage others in these qualities.
ai-pp2.4:108.3_0: They’re accomplished in immersion and encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:108.4_0: They’re accomplished in wisdom and encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:108.5_0: They’re accomplished in freedom, and they encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:108.6_0: They’re accomplished in the knowledge and vision of freedom, and they encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:108.7_0: That’s how a person practices to benefit both themselves and others.
ai-pp2.4:109.1_0: And how does a person practice to benefit neither themselves nor others?
ai-pp2.4:109.2_0: It’s someone who is not accomplished in ethics, immersion, wisdom, freedom, or the knowledge and vision of freedom. But they don’t encourage others in these qualities.
ai-pp2.4:109.3_0: They’re not accomplished in immersion, but don’t encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:109.4_0: They’re not accomplished in wisdom, but don’t encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:109.5_0: They’re not accomplished in freedom, but don’t encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:109.6_0: They’re not accomplished in the knowledge and vision of freedom, but don’t encourage others to do the same.
ai-pp2.4:109.7_0: That’s how a person practices to benefit neither themselves nor others.
ai-pp2.4:110.1_0: And how does one person mortify themselves, pursuing the practice of mortifying themselves?
ai-pp2.4:110.2_0: It’s when someone goes naked, ignoring conventions. They lick their hands, and don’t come or wait when asked. They don’t consent to food brought to me, or drink, or food prepared on their head. They don’t consent to food brought to me, or drink, or food prepared on their home. They don’t accept it. They don’t consent to food brought to them, or drink, or drink, or drink, nor where there is a woman or managed to find a man in the presence of the house.
ai-pp2.4:110.3_0: They go to just one house for alms, taking just one mouthful, or two houses and two mouthfuls, up to seven houses and seven mouthfuls.
ai-pp2.4:110.4_0: Sentient beings are invited to beings.
ai-pp2.4:110.5_0: They feed on one saucer a day, two saucers a day,
ai-pp2.4:110.7_0: They eat once a day, once every second day, up to once a week, and so on, even up to once a fortnight.
ai-pp2.4:110.8_0: They eat once a day, once every second day,
ai-pp2.4:110.9_0: They live pursuing the practice of eating food at set intervals.
ai-pp2.4:110.10_0: They eat herbs, millet, wild rice, poor rice, water lettuce, rice bran, scum from boiling rice, sesame flour, grass, or cow dung. They survive on forest roots and fruits, or eating fallen fruit.
ai-pp2.4:110.11_0: They wear robes of sunn hemp, mixed hemp, corpse-wrapping cloth, rags, lodh tree bark, antelope hide (whole or in strips), kusa grass, bark, wood-chips, human hair, horse-tail hair, horse-tail hair, or owls’ wings.
ai-pp2.4:110.12_0: They live pursuing the practice of mortifying their body.
ai-pp2.4:110.13_0: That’s how one person mortifies themselves, pursuing the practice of mortifying themselves.
ai-pp2.4:111.1_0: And how does one person mortify others, pursuing the practice of mortifying others?
ai-pp2.4:111.2_0: It’s when a person is a slaughterer of sheep, pigs, poultry, or deer, a hunter or fisher, a bandit, an executioner, a butcher of cattle, a jailer, or has some other cruel livelihood.
ai-pp2.4:111.3_0: That’s how one person mortifies others, pursuing the practice of mortifying others.
ai-pp2.4:112.1_0: And how does one person mortify themselves and others, pursuing the practice of mortifying themselves and others?
ai-pp2.4:112.2_0: It’s when a person is an anointed aristocratic king or a well-to-do brahmin.
ai-pp2.4:112.3_0: He has a new temple built to the east of the city. He shaves off his hair and beard, dresses in a rough antelope hide, and smears his body with ghee and oil. Scratching his back with antlers, he enters the temple with his chief queen and the brahmin high priest.
ai-pp2.4:112.4_0: There he lies on the bare ground strewn with grass.
ai-pp2.4:112.5_0: The king feeds on the milk from one teat of a cow that has a calf of the same color. The chief queen feeds on the milk from the second teat. The brahmin high priest feeds on the milk from the third teat. The milk from the fourth teat is served to the sacred flame. The calf feeds on the remainder.
ai-pp2.4:112.7_0: “Slaughter this many bulls, bullocks, heifers, goats, rams, and horses for the sacrifice! Fell this many trees and reap this much grass for the sacrificial equipment!”
ai-pp2.4:112.8_0: His bondservants, employees, and workers do their jobs under threat of punishment and danger, weeping with tearful faces.
ai-pp2.4:112.9_0: That’s how one person mortifies themselves and others, pursuing the practice of mortifying themselves and others.
ai-pp2.4:113.1_0: And how does one person neither mortify themselves nor others, pursuing the practice of not mortifying themselves or others,
ai-pp2.4:113.2_0: They live without wishes in the present life, extinguished, cooled, experiencing bliss, having become holy in themselves.
ai-pp2.4:114.1_0: A Realized One arises in the world, perfected, a fully awakened Buddha, accomplished in knowledge and conduct, holy, knower of the world, supreme guide for those who wish to train, teacher of gods and humans, awakened, blessed.
ai-pp2.4:114.2_0: He has realized with his own insight this world—with its gods, Māras and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, gods and humans—and he makes it known to others.
ai-pp2.4:114.3_0: He teaches Dhamma that’s good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end, meaningful and well-phrased. And he reveals a spiritual practice that’s entirely full and pure.
ai-pp2.4:114.4_0: A householder hears that teaching, or a householder’s child, or someone reborn in some clan.
ai-pp2.4:114.5_0: Having heard that teaching they gained faith in the Realized One,
ai-pp2.4:114.7_0: “Living in a house is cramped and dirty, but the life of one gone forth is wide open.
ai-pp2.4:114.8_0: It’s not easy for someone living at home to lead the spiritual life utterly full and pure, like a polished shell.
ai-pp2.4:114.9_0: Why don’t I cut off my hair and beard, dress in ocher robes, and go forth from lay life to homelessness?”
ai-pp2.4:114.10_0: After some time they give up a large or small fortune, and a large or small family circle. They shave off hair and beard, dress in ocher robes, and go forth from the lay life to homelessness.
ai-pp2.4:115.1_0: Once they’ve gone forth, they give up the training and livelihood of the mendicants. They renounce the rod and the sword. They’re scrupulous and kind, living full of compassion for all living beings.
ai-pp2.4:116.1_0: They give up stealing. They take only what’s given, and expect only what’s given. They keep themselves clean by not thieving.
ai-pp2.4:117.1_0: They give up unchastity. They refrain from unchastity. They are celibate, set apart, avoiding the common practice of sex.
ai-pp2.4:118.1_0: They give up lying. They speak the truth and stick to the truth. They’re honest and trustworthy, and don’t trick the world with their words.
ai-pp2.4:119.2_0: He doesn’t repeat in one place what he heard in another so as to divide people against each other. Instead, he reconciles those who are divided, supporting unity, delighting in harmony, loving harmony, speaking words that promote harmony.
ai-pp2.4:120.2_0: They speak in a way that’s mellow, pleasing to the ear, lovely, going to the heart, polite, likable and agreeable to the people.
ai-pp2.4:121.1_0: They give up talking nonsense. Their words are timely, true, and meaningful, in line with the teaching and training. They say things at the right time which are valuable, reasonable, succinct, and beneficial.
ai-pp2.4:122.1_0: They refrain from injuring plants and seeds. They refrain from food, drink, clothes, and beds; garlands and perfumes; and beds; garlands, perfumes, and makeup; and bed, house, and lighting.
ai-pp2.4:123.1_0: raw grains, chickens, and male and female bondservants, goats and sheeps, chickens and pigs, and elephants and cattles, and gold and money. They refrain from receiving staff, bandits, or beasts, chickens and pigs, meat, jackals and hands, and hangs; and sheeps; or males, chickens and pigs, and cattles, and female bondservants, goats, chickens, and stalkens and pigs.
ai-pp2.4:124.1_0: They’re content with robes to look after the body and alms-food to look after the belly.
ai-pp2.4:124.2_0: Wherever they go, they set out taking only the lump of foliage, just like the bird: wherever it was due, is the only bird.
ai-pp2.4:124.3_0: In the same way, a mendicant is content with robes to look after the body and alms-food to look after the belly.
ai-pp2.4:124.4_0: Wherever they go, they set out taking only these things.
ai-pp2.4:124.5_0: When they have this entire spectrum of noble ethics, they experience a blameless happiness inside themselves.
ai-pp2.4:125.1_0: When they see a sight with their eyes, they don’t get caught up in the features and details.
ai-pp2.4:125.2_0: If the faculty of sight were left unrestrained, bad unskillful qualities of desire and aversion would become overwhelming. For this reason, he practices restraint, protecting the faculty of sight, and achieving restraint over it.
ai-pp2.4:125.3_0: Hearing a sound with the ears ...
ai-pp2.4:125.4_0: When they smell an odor with their nose ...
ai-pp2.4:125.5_0: Tasting a flavor with the tongue ...
ai-pp2.4:125.6_0: When we feel a touch with our body ...
ai-pp2.4:125.7_0: Knowing a thought with their mind, they don’t get caught up in the features and details.
ai-pp2.4:125.8_0: If the faculty of mind were left unrestrained, bad unskillful qualities of desire and aversion would become overwhelming. For this reason, he practices restraint, protecting the faculty of mind, and achieving restraint over it.
ai-pp2.4:125.9_0: When they have this noble sense restraint, they experience an unsullied bliss inside themselves.
ai-pp2.4:126.1_0: They act with situational awareness when going out and coming back; when looking ahead and aside; when bending and extending the limbs; when bearing the outer robe, bowl and robes; when eating, drinking, chewing, and tasting; when urinating and defecating; when walking, standing, sitting, sleeping, waking, speaking, and keeping silent.
ai-pp2.4:127.1_0: When they have this noble spectrum of ethics, this noble sense restraint, this noble mindfulness and situational awareness, and this noble contentment, secluded, aloofness, mass of the noble ones, a wilderness dwelling, the root of a tree, or a fruition of wilderness.
ai-pp2.4:127.2_0: After the meal, they return from alms-round, sit down cross-legged with their body straight, and establish mindfulness right there.
ai-pp2.4:127.3_0: Giving up desire for the world, he meditates with a heart rid of desire, cleansing the mind of desire.
ai-pp2.4:127.4_0: Giving up ill will and malevolence, they meditate with a mind rid of ill will, full of compassion for all living beings, cleansing the mind of ill will.
ai-pp2.4:127.5_0: Giving up dullness and drowsiness, they meditate with a mind rid of dullness and drowsiness, perceiving light, mindful and aware, cleansing the mind of dullness and drowsiness.
ai-pp2.4:127.6_0: Giving up restlessness and remorse, he meditates without restlessness, his mind peaceful inside, cleansing the mind of restlessness and remorse.
ai-pp2.4:127.7_0: Giving up doubt, he meditates having gone beyond doubt, not undecided about skillful qualities, cleansing the mind of doubt.
ai-pp2.4:128.1_0: They give up these five hindrances, secluded from sensual pleasures, secluded from unskillful qualities, they enter and remain in the first absorption, which has the rapture and bliss born of seclusion, while placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-pp2.4:128.4_0: With the giving up of pleasure and pain, and the ending of former happiness and sadness, they enter and remain in the fourth absorption, without pleasure or pain, with pure equanimity and mindfulness.
ai-pp2.4:129.1_0: When their mind has become immersed in samādhi like this—purified, bright, flawless, rid of corruptions, pliable, workable, steady, and imperturbable—they extend it toward recollection of past lives. ...
ai-pp2.4:129.2_0: They recollect many kinds of past lives.
ai-pp2.4:129.3_0: one birth, two births, three births, four births, five births, ten births, twenty births, thirty births, forty births, fifty births, a hundred births, a thousand births, a hundred thousand births, and many eons of world dissolution, many eons of world evolution, and many eons of both dissolution and evolution, and I knew:
ai-pp2.4:129.4_0: “There, I was named this, my clan was that, I looked like this, and that was my food.
ai-pp2.4:129.5_0: They remember: ‘There, I was named this, my clan was that, I looked like this, and that was my food.
ai-pp2.4:129.6_0: They remember: ‘There, I was named this, my clan was that, I looked like this, and that was my food. This was how I felt pleasure and pain, and that was how my life ended. When I passed away from that place I was reborn somewhere else. There, too, I was named this, my clan was that, I looked like this, and that was my food. This was how I felt pleasure and pain, and that was how my life ended. When I passed away from that place I was reborn here.’ And so they recollect their many kinds of past lives, with features and details.
ai-pp2.4:130.1_0: When their mind has become immersed in samādhi like this—purified, bright, flawless, rid of corruptions, pliable, workable, steady, and imperturbable—they extend it toward knowledge of the death and rebirth of sentient beings.
ai-pp2.4:130.2_0: With clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman, they see sentient beings passing away and being reborn—inferior and superior, beautiful and ugly, in a good place or a bad place. They understand how sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds:
ai-pp2.4:130.3_0: “These dear beings did bad things by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-pp2.4:130.4_0: They spoke ill of the noble ones; they had wrong view; and they acted out of that wrong view.
ai-pp2.4:130.5_0: ‘These dear beings did good things by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-pp2.4:130.6_0: at the breaking up of the body after death, have been reborn in a good destination, a heaven world.”
ai-pp2.4:130.7_0: They never spoke ill of the noble ones; they had right view; and they chose to act out of that right view. When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.’ And so, with clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman, they see sentient beings passing away and being reborn—inferior and superior, beautiful and ugly, in a good place or a bad place. They understand how sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds.
ai-pp2.4:131.1_0: When their mind has become immersed in samādhi like this—purified, bright, flawless, rid of corruptions, pliable, workable, steady, and imperturbable—they extend it toward knowledge of the ending of defilements.
ai-pp2.4:131.2_0: They truly understand: “This is suffering” ... “This is the origin of suffering” ... “This is the cessation of suffering” ... “This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering”.
ai-pp2.4:131.4_0: Knowing and seeing like this, their mind is freed from the defilements of sensuality, desire to be reborn, and ignorance.
ai-pp2.4:131.5_0: When it is freed, he knows it is freed.
ai-pp2.4:131.6_0: he knows: “Rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.”
ai-pp2.4:131.7_0: That’s how one person neither mortifies themselves nor others, pursuing the practice of not mortifying themselves or others,
ai-pp2.4:131.8_0: They live without wishes in the present life, extinguished, cooled, experiencing bliss, having become holy in themselves.
ai-pp2.4:132.1_0: And who is the person with greed?
ai-pp2.4:132.2_0: Whoever hasn’t given up greed is called a person who has not given up greed.
ai-pp2.4:133.1_0: And who is the person with hate?
ai-pp2.4:133.2_0: Whoever has not given up hate, is called a person who has not given up hate.
ai-pp2.4:134.1_0: And who is the person like a person?
ai-pp2.4:134.2_0: Whoever hasn’t given up delusion, is called a person who has not given up delusion.
ai-pp2.4:135.1_0: And who is the person who,
ai-pp2.4:135.2_0: whoever person hasn’t given up conceit, thinking “This person is said to be a person who hasn’t given up,”
ai-pp2.4:136.1_0: And how is a person who has serenity but not discernment?
ai-pp2.4:136.2_0: It’s when a person has gained the realm of luminous form or suitable fortune, or attainment.
ai-pp2.4:136.3_0: That’s how a person has internal serenity of heart, but not the higher wisdom of discernment of principles.
ai-pp2.4:137.1_0: And how is a person who has discernment but not serenity?
ai-pp2.4:137.2_0: It’s someone who doesn’t have the supermundane of form, nor do they get to know or see or realize the fruit of non-return.
ai-pp2.4:137.3_0: That’s how a person has discernment but not serenity.
ai-pp2.4:138.1_0: And how is a person has both serenity and discernment?
ai-pp2.4:138.2_0: It’s when a person has gained the realm of luminous form or suitable fortune, or more fruitless.
ai-pp2.4:138.3_0: That’s how a person has both serenity and discernment.
ai-pp2.4:139.1_0: And how is a person who has neither serenity nor discernment?
ai-pp2.4:139.2_0: It’s someone who doesn’t have the form of form, or the formless realm.
ai-pp2.4:139.3_0: That’s how a person has neither serenity nor discernment.
ai-pp2.4:140.1_0: And who is the person who goes with the stream?
ai-pp2.4:140.2_0: It may be that someone takes part in sensual pleasures and does bad deeds.
ai-pp2.4:140.3_0: This is called a person who goes against the stream.
ai-pp2.4:141.1_0: And who is the person who goes against the stream?
ai-pp2.4:141.2_0: It may be that a person doesn’t take part in sensual pleasures and do bad deeds.
ai-pp2.4:141.3_0: They lead the full and pure spiritual life in pain and sadness, weeping, with tearful faces.
ai-pp2.4:141.4_0: This is called a person who goes against the stream.
ai-pp2.4:142.1_0: And who is the steadfast person?
ai-pp2.4:142.2_0: It may happen that a person who, with the ending of the five lower fetters, is reborn spontaneously. They’re extinguished there, and are not liable to return from that world.
ai-pp2.4:142.3_0: This is called a person with holding a knot.
ai-pp2.4:143.1_0: And who is a brahmin who has crossed over and stands on the far shore?
ai-pp2.4:143.2_0: It’s someone who realizes the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-pp2.4:143.3_0: This is called a brahmin who has crossed over and stands on the far shore.
ai-pp2.4:144.1_0: And how has a person learned little and not got the point of learning?
ai-pp2.4:144.2_0: Take a certain person who gives little gratification in prose and verse, few expositions, verses, inspired exclamations, quotations, birth stories, amazing accounts, and analyses;
ai-pp2.4:144.3_0: And with the little they’ve learned, they understand neither the meaning nor the text, nor do they practice in line with the teaching.
ai-pp2.4:144.4_0: That’s how a person has learned little and not got the point of learning.
ai-pp2.4:145.1_0: And how has a person learned little and has got the point of learning?
ai-pp2.4:145.2_0: Take a certain person who gives little gratification in prose and verse, few expositions, verses, inspired exclamations, quotations, birth stories, amazing accounts, and analyses;
ai-pp2.4:145.3_0: And with the little they’ve learned, they understand the meaning and the text, and they practice in line with the teaching.
ai-pp2.4:145.4_0: That’s how a person has learned little and has got the point of learning.
ai-pp2.4:146.1_0: And how has a person learned much and hasn't got the point of learning?
ai-pp2.4:146.2_0: Take a certain person who gives a teaching in prose and verse, many expositions, verses, inspired exclamations, quotations, birth stories, amazing accounts, and analyses;
ai-pp2.4:146.3_0: And with the large amount they’ve learned, they understand the meaning and the text, and they practice in line with the teaching.
ai-pp2.4:146.4_0: That’s how a person has learned much but hasn't got the point of learning.
ai-pp2.4:147.1_0: And how has a person learned much and has got the point of learning?
ai-pp2.4:147.2_0: Take a certain person who gives a teaching in prose and verse, many expositions, verses, inspired exclamations, quotations, birth stories, amazing accounts, and analyses;
ai-pp2.4:147.3_0: And with the large amount they’ve learned, they understand the meaning and the text, and they practice in line with the teaching.
ai-pp2.4:147.4_0: That’s how a person has learned much and has got the point of learning.
ai-pp2.4:148.1_0: And what person is a confirmed ascetic?
ai-pp2.4:148.2_0: It’s someone who—with the ending of three fetters—is a stream-enterer, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening.
ai-pp2.4:148.3_0: This is called a person with no confirmed mind.
ai-pp2.4:149.1_0: And who is the person’s lotus pond?
ai-pp2.4:149.2_0: It’s when a person—with the ending of three fetters, and the weakening of greed, hate, and delusion—is a once-returner. They come back to this world once only, then make an end of suffering.
ai-pp2.4:149.3_0: This is called a person who has been reborn in an ascetic.
ai-pp2.4:150.1_0: And who is the person who’s white lotus?
ai-pp2.4:150.2_0: It may happen that a person who, with the ending of the five lower fetters, is reborn spontaneously. They’re extinguished there, and are not liable to return from that world.
ai-pp2.4:150.3_0: This is called a person who is white lotuses.
ai-pp2.4:151.1_0: And who is a person an exquisite ascetic of ascetics?
ai-pp2.4:151.2_0: It’s someone who realizes the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And they live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-pp2.4:151.3_0: This is called a person who is an exquisite ascetic of ascetics.
